name: XML Based Tree Menu

screenshots.caption: This is screenshot of XML Tree Menu with its XML Editor

short_description: This project is about Editable XML based Tree Menu with its XML Database Editor. This project is user-friendly, easy-to-use, easy-to-edit, fast and flexible. Mainly, the user be able to easily navigate a site with potentially hundreds of links.
